elements.description:
# oe-combo

An input control with dropdown for possible valid values.
The data can be supplied statically under `listdata` property and can be dynamically fetched by
specifying `listurl` property.

properties.name: errorPlaceholders
properties.description: i18n placeholders for the error

properties.name: userErrorMessage
properties.description:
User specified Custom error message
If userErrorMessage is defined, show appropriate user-error-message
which is either an object
   ```{
      rangeOverflow:'Date should be prior',
      default: 'Invalid Value in field'
   }```
or a string, 'Invalid value'
So check if specific error-coode is defined in user-error-message object
If not, see if 'default' error-code is defined
otherwise if user-error-message is string, show that error-message,
if not, then resort to incoming-error-message.

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Error message displayed

properties.name: _hasCustomMessage
properties.description: Flag for Custom error message/code

properties.name: validationFunction
properties.description: Custom validation function

properties.name: fieldId
properties.description: binding to property

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

properties.name: displayproperty
properties.description: Property within the listdata to be used for display

properties.name: valueproperty
properties.description:
Property of the selected record, that is set as current value.
When records are plain strings, leave this property undefined

properties.name: multi
properties.description: Flag to set for enabling combo to choose multiple values

properties.name: valueAsText
properties.description: When multi is true, this flag exposes value as comma separated text instead of an array

properties.name: showTemplate
properties.description: When set to true, the selected value is shown as the template given for the combo

properties.name: value
properties.description: Current selected value

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description:
Selected record in the list. `value` equals `selectedItem`[`valueproperty`].
When records are plain strings, it is same as `value`

properties.name: selectedItems
properties.description:
Selected records from the list. `value` equals `selectedItem`[`valueproperty`].
When records are plain strings, it is same as `value`

properties.name: showRefresh
properties.description: Flag to control whether refresh button is displayed or not.

properties.name: showFilteredOnly
properties.description: Flag to control whether only the filtered values should be displayed.

properties.name: disableCache
properties.description: Disable caching of listdata

properties.name: listkey
properties.description:
Key specifies the unique key to fetch data from cache(oeCache).
Incase, there is no data for the key specified in the cache and listurl is specified,
the data is fetched from the listurl and set in the cache for this key.

properties.name: listdata
properties.description:
Array of records to be displayed in dropdown. Can be array of primitives as well as objects.
When items are objects, you should specify `displayproperty` and `valueproperty`.

properties.name: listurl
properties.description: URL from where data to be displayed in dropdown, should be fetched

properties.name: allowFreeText
properties.description: Flag to set to enable entering values not present in the listdata

properties.name: scrollAction
properties.description:
scrollAction binded to iron-dropdown
* "lock" - Prevents scrolling of body
* "refit" - Moves the dropdown based on scroll
* "cancel" - Closes the dropdown on scroll

methods.name: setValidity
methods.description:
Sets the vality and errorMessage based on the input parameters and
the `userErrorMessage`

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _setValidity
methods.description: Sets the 'invalid' flag and 'errorMessage'

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _validate
methods.description: Custom validation of oe-combo to check based on allowFreeText and other flags

methods.name: validate
methods.description:
Validate, overrides Paper-Input-Behavior's validate method
Used to set the validity based on core input element's validity

return.desc: validity of core input element.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description:
Connected callback to attach event listeners and
handle templating of the listbox

methods.name: hashFunc
methods.description: Generates a Hash for the given string.

params.name: str
params.description: String for which Hash needs to be computed

return.desc: hash number for the given string

methods.name: __customTemplatize
methods.description:
Replaces template from dom-if,dom-repeat or dom-bind with source template.
If the target is not a dom-if,dom-repeat or dom-bind , creates a new templateInstance ,
attahces a stamped node and returns the instance.
If the target is not provided it returns a templateInstance class

params.name: source
params.description: HTML template element to stamp (from lightdom)

return.desc: Generated class bound to the source template or stamped instance.

methods.name: _deepValue
methods.description: Get the value from the 'obj' based on the 'path'.

return.desc: value present in the given path of the obj.

methods.name: debounce

params.name: jobName
params.description: String to identify the debounce job.

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function that is called (with `this`
  context) when the wait time elapses.

params.name: wait
params.description:
Optional wait time in milliseconds (ms) after the
  last signal that must elapse before invoking `callback`

return.desc:
Returns a debouncer object on which exists the
following methods: `isActive()` returns true if the debouncer is
active; `cancel()` cancels the debouncer if it is active;
`flush()` immediately invokes the debounced callback if the debouncer
is active.

methods.name: async
methods.description:
Runs a callback function asynchronously.

By default (if no waitTime is specified), async callbacks are run at
microtask timing, which will occur before paint.

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback function to run, bound to `this`.

params.name: waitTime
params.description:
Time to wait before calling the
  `callback`.  If unspecified or 0, the callback will be run at microtask
  timing (before paint).

return.desc: Handle that may be used to cancel the async job.

methods.name: fire
methods.description: Polymer fire function used to dispatch custom events

params.name: detail
params.description: data to be sent in the event

params.name: options
params.description: optionals options for the event {bubbles:Boolean,cancelable:Boolean,composed:Boolean,node:HTML Element}

return.desc: Custom event created based on the parameters

methods.name: _focusBlurHandler
methods.description: Override paper-input-behavior focus-blur handler

methods.name: _selectedItemsChanged
methods.description:
Event listener to set the value based on the user selection,
when `multi` is set as true.

methods.name: _fetchListData
methods.description:
Check of cache store in OEUtils namespace and add event listeners.
If cache is present set the cached data in `listdata` else call `_fetchData`

methods.name: _fetchData
methods.description:
Fetches the listdata based on the `listurl` and fires
event 'oe-update-cache' to update the cache store

methods.name: _setDisplayAndValidate
methods.description:
Observer function listening to changes in `value` and `listdata`
Computes the display of the oe-combo and selects the correct values from paper-listbox,
based on `value` set on the element.

methods.name: _keydown
methods.description: Key down event listener for oe-combo

methods.name: _showTemplateChanged
methods.description:
Observer to `showTemplate`.
CSS management to display the template instead of the input box.

methods.name: _keyup
methods.description: Key up event listener to handle 'Up/Down/Enter' keys and other keys as search term.

methods.name: _handleDownEvent
methods.description:
Down key listener to open and display the menu box.
Once opened traverse the list data

methods.name: _handleEnterEvent
methods.description: Select the focused Item from the listbox using the 'Enter' key

methods.name: _menuClose
methods.description: Close menu and empty the list

methods.name: _menuOpen
methods.description:
Based on the position of the element in screen,
Computes alighnment , offset and opens the menu.

methods.name: _dropdownClick
methods.description:
Shows all the listdata items when drop down arrow clicks
It will check for open if not it will add class open and it will add to suggestions

methods.name: _expandChange
methods.description:
It will execute when the expand property changes
And adds event listener for click on html when it open (expand = true)

methods.name: onItemSelected
methods.description: on-tap of a list item it is selected

methods.name: _getDisplayValue
methods.description: Returns the display property of the item or the item

return.desc: Display string for the item

methods.name: _getItemValue
methods.description: Returns the value property of the item or the item

return.desc: value of the item.

methods.name: _search
methods.description: It will fire when we type any key except ['enter', 'up', 'down']

methods.name: _findMatchedObjects
methods.description:
Finds the matched objects
TODO: Check regular expression for all the possible cases and for valid expression also.

methods.name: _setSelectedItem
methods.description:
Set the value to the value property
This will be the final step for selecting the listed items

methods.name: sortData
methods.description:
Sorts data based on displayproperty
Kept method as public so that user can overwrite it if needed

methods.name: __resetComponent
methods.description:
Reset the fields in the component,
removes 'value',displayValue and error state.

elements.name: OeCombo

attributes.name: error-placeholders
attributes.description: i18n placeholders for the error

attributes.name: user-error-message

If userErrorMessage is defined, show appropriate user-error-message

attributes.name: validation-function

attributes.name: field-id

scrollAction binded to iron-dropdown
* "lock" - Prevents scrolling of body
* "refit" - Moves the dropdown based on scroll

events.name: oe-field-error
events.description: Fired when the field is invalid

events.name: oe-field-ok
events.description: Fired when the field is valid

events.name: register-field
events.description: Fired when the element is attached to DOM to register the element

events.name: oe-field-changed
events.description: Fired when the value of the field is changed by the user

events.name: oe-update-cache
events.description:
Fetches the listdata based on the `listurl` and fires
event 'oe-update-cache' to update the cache store

events.name: pt-item-confirmed
events.description: Fired when the element item is selected

elements.description:
# oe-typeahead
An input control with autocomplete and dynamic search

```
  <oe-typeahead label="Search..." searchurl="data/list/SEARCH_STRING.json" dataurl="data/list/VALUE_STRING.json" value="{{value}}"></oe-typeahead>

  <oe-typeahead label="Search..." strict searchurl="data/list/SEARCH_STRING.json" dataurl="data/list/VALUE_STRING.json" value="{{value}}"></oe-typeahead>

  <oe-typeahead label="Search..." displayproperty="description" valueproperty="code" searchurl="data/country/SEARCH_STRING.json" dataurl="data/country/VALUE_STRING.json" value="{{value}}"></oe-typeahead>
```

properties.name: errorPlaceholders
properties.description: i18n placeholders for the error

properties.name: userErrorMessage
properties.description:
User specified Custom error message
If userErrorMessage is defined, show appropriate user-error-message
which is either an object
   ```{
      rangeOverflow:'Date should be prior',
      default: 'Invalid Value in field'
   }```
or a string, 'Invalid value'
So check if specific error-coode is defined in user-error-message object
If not, see if 'default' error-code is defined
otherwise if user-error-message is string, show that error-message,
if not, then resort to incoming-error-message.

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Custom user error mesasge

properties.name: _hasCustomMessage
properties.description: Flag for Custom error message/code

properties.name: validationFunction
properties.description: Custom validation function

properties.name: fieldId
properties.description: binding to property

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

properties.name: displayValue
properties.description: Value which will be displayed on input field

properties.name: displayproperty
properties.description: For object, which property to be shown for display in the input field

properties.name: valueproperty
properties.description: For object, which property to be placed as value for typeahead

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value of the object/string

properties.name: _suggestions
properties.description: List of values fetched from server for matching values with given rest API

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description: For object, has the whole object of the selection

properties.name: debounceDuration
properties.description: Duration between successive requests

properties.name: searchString
properties.description: String using which pattern is matched to get suggested values

properties.name: searchurl
properties.description: REST API endpoint which will be used to fetch suggested values matching the pattern

properties.name: dataurl
properties.description:
Used during edit of typeahead, this will be used to fetch/search
for correct object/value with given value

properties.name: strict
properties.description:
Checks for typed value present in the suggestions
If true, throws error if value typed not present in suggested list
If false, allows values not present in suggestions

properties.name: scrollAction
properties.description:
scrollAction binded to iron-dropdown
* "lock" - Prevents scrolling of body
* "refit" - Moves the dropdown based on scroll
* "cancel" - Closes the dropdown on scroll

methods.name: setValidity
methods.description:
Sets the vality and errorMessage based on the input parameters and
the `userErrorMessage`

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: _setValidity
methods.description: Sets the 'invalid' flag and 'errorMessage'

params.name: errorMessage
params.description: error message from the input element

methods.name: validate
methods.description:

return.desc: validity of core input element.

methods.description:

methods.name: hashFunc
methods.description: Generates a Hash for the given string.

params.name: str
params.description: String for which Hash needs to be computed

return.desc: hash number for the given string

If the target is not provided it returns a templateInstance class

params.name: source

return.desc: Generated class bound to the source template or stamped instance.

methods.name: _deepValue
methods.description: Get the value from the 'obj' based on the 'path'.

return.desc: value present in the given path of the obj.

methods.name: debounce

params.name: jobName
params.description: String to identify the debounce job.

params.name: callback
params.description:
Function that is called (with `this`
  context) when the wait time elapses.

params.name: wait
params.description:
Optional wait time in milliseconds (ms) after the
  last signal that must elapse before invoking `callback`

return.desc:
Returns a debouncer object on which exists the
following methods: `isActive()` returns true if the debouncer is
active; `cancel()` cancels the debouncer if it is active;
`flush()` immediately invokes the debounced callback if the debouncer
is active.

methods.name: async
methods.description:
Runs a callback function asynchronously.

By default (if no waitTime is specified), async callbacks are run at
microtask timing, which will occur before paint.

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback function to run, bound to `this`.

params.name: waitTime
params.description:
Time to wait before calling the
  `callback`.  If unspecified or 0, the callback will be run at microtask
  timing (before paint).

return.desc: Handle that may be used to cancel the async job.

methods.name: fire
methods.description: Polymer fire function used to dispatch custom events

params.name: detail
params.description: data to be sent in the event

params.name: options
params.description: optionals options for the event {bubbles:Boolean,cancelable:Boolean,composed:Boolean,node:HTML Element}

return.desc: Custom event created based on the parameters

methods.name: _onAjaxResponse
methods.description: Checks response for search/data and sets the noDataFound property

methods.name: onMouseOver
methods.description:
When using custom templates, bind it to mouseover event
of template component as on-mouseover="onMouseOver"

methods.name: onItemSelected
methods.description:
When using custom templates, bind it to tap event
of template component as on-tap="onItemSelected"

methods.name: _setSelectedItem
methods.description: Used to set the selectedItem and value properties

methods.name: _getDisplayValue
methods.description: Revisit getDisplayValue with iron-list template

methods.name: _getRequestUrl
methods.description: Used to get the search url after replacing the search pattern

methods.name: sortData
methods.description:
Sorts data based on displayproperty
Kept method as public so that user can overwrite it if needed

elements.name: OeTypeahead

attributes.name: error-placeholders
attributes.description: i18n placeholders for the error

attributes.name: user-error-message
attributes.description:
User specified Custom error message
If userErrorMessage is defined, show appropriate user-error-message
which is either an object
   ```{
      rangeOverflow:'Date should be prior',
      default: 'Invalid Value in field'
   }```
or a string, 'Invalid value'
So check if specific error-coode is defined in user-error-message object
If not, see if 'default' error-code is defined
otherwise if user-error-message is string, show that error-message,
if not, then resort to incoming-error-message.

attributes.name: error-message
attributes.description: Custom user error mesasge

attributes.name: validation-function
attributes.description: Custom validation function

attributes.name: field-id
attributes.description: binding to property

attributes.name: display-value
attributes.description: Value which will be displayed on input field

attributes.name: displayproperty
attributes.description: For object, which property to be shown for display in the input field

attributes.name: valueproperty
attributes.description: For object, which property to be placed as value for typeahead

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value of the object/string

attributes.name: selected-item
attributes.description: For object, has the whole object of the selection

attributes.name: debounce-duration
attributes.description: Duration between successive requests

attributes.name: search-string
attributes.description: String using which pattern is matched to get suggested values

attributes.name: searchurl
attributes.description: REST API endpoint which will be used to fetch suggested values matching the pattern

attributes.name: dataurl
attributes.description:
Used during edit of typeahead, this will be used to fetch/search
for correct object/value with given value

attributes.name: strict
attributes.description:
Checks for typed value present in the suggestions
If true, throws error if value typed not present in suggested list
If false, allows values not present in suggestions

attributes.name: scroll-action
attributes.description:
scrollAction binded to iron-dropdown
* "lock" - Prevents scrolling of body
* "refit" - Moves the dropdown based on scroll
* "cancel" - Closes the dropdown on scroll

events.name: oe-field-error
events.description: Fired when the field is invalid

events.name: oe-field-ok
events.description: Fired when the field is valid

events.name: register-field
events.description: Fired when the element is attached to DOM to register the element

events.name: oe-field-changed
events.description: Fired when the value of the field is changed by the user
